segments.text: oh , the clothes here are so expensive ! No wonder there are few people .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Beauty costs , dear ! What do you think of this dress ? Do you think it suits me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yeah , it's lovely , but to be frank , it's not the most practical . You don't have many formal events in your calendar , do you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: come on , you sound like my Mom.Look at that , it's beautiful !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: when you buy clothes , you must think about the material , quality and price .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: make sure you buy what you need and your clothes can be worn for various occasions .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: all right . How about this black shirt ? It can be worn for anything---a party , a job interview and even a funeral !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's true , but you already have two back coats and one black sweater .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh ! Hey , look , that's the same shirt Britney wore in her concert .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: exactly ! Oh , my god ! I love Britney ! I'm going to get it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it's just the right size--a perfect fit ! I'll take it . Oh , no , I'm a little short . Did you bring your credit card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I promise I'll pay you back as soon as we get home .
segments.speaker: S1
